title: Magnificent 4 BR two story townhome near Aliante.
map_address: 549 Coastal Dreams Ave. near Centennial Pkwy and Revere
posting_body: ['Magnificent 4 bed/2.5 bath two story townhome near Aliante!', '1,962 sq.', 'ft. Two car attached garage.', 'Large front living room with a fireplace and a ceiling fan!', 'Dining area.', 'Kitchen has an island with a breakfast bar.', 'NEW TILE FLOORS', 'THROUGHOUT DOWNSTAIRS!', 'All bedrooms are upstairs!', 'Master bedroom has a walk-in closet.', 'Master bath has double sinks and a separate tub and shower!', 'Has a backyard area with a patio!', 'Only one half a wall shared with a neighbor!', 'No Section 8.', 'All appliances included!', 'Pets allowed.', 'No smoking.', 'For more information on this property or to set up an appointment to view it, please call Chris at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Please reference the street name 549 COASTAL DREAMS AVE.', ' when calling!', '~First United Management Group, LLC.~', 'Located at Centennial Pkwy and Revere.', 'License # S.0169212']
